column1: question
Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? "Celebrities like sports players and musicians have a good influence on young people."
Do you prefer to make a schedule beforehand or do you prefer to figure out as time approaches?
Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? "The success of a school depends on experienced teachers."
What is the better way to get to know each other better, having a meeting or having a long term relationship?
Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? "Students should take additional courses to get extra credits quickly."
Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? "People should retire from the job at the age of 65."
Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? "Children should be given some kind of award such as money if they do well in school"
What would you choose among the two choices; an opportunity to stand out in your office or your sister's birthday.
Do you prefer to work independently or do you like to work under tight supervision?

Imagine that you have been accepted by two different universities, one is well-known for its excellent academic program, but it's expensive, while the other is less well-known, but has offered you a scholarship. Choose one.
Some people prefer sending messages while others prefer making phone calls directly, which one do you prefer?
Some people share their daily lives through the internet, while others avoid sharing their everyday lives on SNS. Which do you prefer?

You are a student and the professor has evaluated the assignment you have submitted. You can either receive feedback by talking to the professor directly or just receive feedback by getting written comments on your assignment. Which would you prefer?
Do you agree or disagree? It is good for children to live at a relative's house or a friend's house for a short period of time away from their home.
If you had a fight with a friend and you wish to make up with him/her, would you either meet with your friend face-to-face and have a conversation or send a message through e-mail or text message?
Do you agree or disagree with the given statement? Assignments handed in late should receive penalties. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
Some people argue that robots will replace humans in the near future, while some people disagree, saying that robots will never be as intelligent as humans. With which argument do you agree, and why?

Some people believe that a teacher with extensive teaching experience is better than a teacher with little experience. What is your opinion on this statement, and why? Give specific examples and details.
Would you prefer to take a class that gives you many little assignments or a class that gives you one or two big assignments? Use specific reasons and examples in your explanation.

Some people enjoy living in a location that has a warm climate all year. Other people like to live in a place where the seasons change. Which type of place do you prefer and why? Include specific examples and details in your answer.

Some people like to plan how they will spend their free time in advance. Others do not like to pre-plan their free time activities, preferring to be spontaneous. Which do you think is better? Explain why.
Some people prefer to travel by car. Others prefer to use public transportation such as buses and trains. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.

Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Students (teenagers) should experience working at part-time jobs before attending college. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Children should not have cell phones. Give reasons and details.
Some people prefer to get high paying jobs that are far away from their hometown. Others prefer jobs with average pay but closer to their homes. Which do you prefer and why?
Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are a child's most important teachers.
Do you agree or disagree with the statement? Students learn more when they participate in class discussion. Use specific reasons and examples to support your idea.
Do you think 16-year-olds are responsible enough to be able to drive? Use specific reasons and examples in your explanation.
Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? An artist needs to be gifted to succeed. Use specific reasons and examples in your explanation.
Do you agree or disagree with the given statement? Advertisements have a strong influence on people's decisions. Give specific details and examples to support your idea.
Should your government build a library or a parking lot in your community?
When preparing for an exam, some students like to study with other people while others like to study alone. Which do you prefer and why?

Some people believe it's better to wear formal clothes at work while others believe it's better to wear casual clothes. Which do you prefer and why? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
Some students prefer to take classes alone and others prefer to take classes with their friends. Which do you prefer and why? Use specific examples to support your choice.

When on vacation, some people prefer to participate in outdoor activities, such as hiking or swimming. Other people prefer to be less physically active on vacation. Which type of vacation do you prefer?
Some people like living with roommates, while others like living alone. Which do you prefer and why? Include details and examples to support your explanation.

Some people prefer to attend universities in big cities. Others prefer universities in small towns. Which location do you think is better for students and why? Include details and examples in your explanation.
Some people like spending time with their friends at home, while others prefer to meet them outside. Which do you prefer and why? Include details and examples in your explanation.
When people acquire a bit of extra money, some choose to spend it quickly, and others prefer to save up for something special. Which approach do you think is better?

Some students like to ask questions to their instructors when they do not understand a topic. Others choose to consult with their classmates. Which do you prefer and why? Include details and examples in your explanation.
State whether you agree or disagree with the following statement. Then explain your reasons using specific details in your explanation. People lead healthier lives today.
Some college students live in dormitories. Others live off campus. Where do you prefer to live and why? Include details and examples in your explanation.
Some people like to attend live performances, while others prefer watching them on television. Which do you prefer and why?
State whether you agree or disagree with the following statement. Then explain your reasons using specific details in your explanation. All newspapers and books will be in electronic form one day.
Would you prefer to take a challenging course or an easy course at university? Include details and examples in your explanation.
Some students like to study in large classes, while others like to study in small ones. Which method do you think is more effective for students and why?
Would you prefer to work with someone who has a similar way of thinking to you or someone who thinks differently from you? Include details and examples in your explanation.

State whether you agree or disagree with the following statement. Then explain your reasons using specific details in your explanation. The government should force rich people to share their wealth with poor people by imposing higher taxes on them.
